Html:
Hi Guys,

Can someone help me to simulate the same header look and feel that is available for other non-template columns of the data grid such as (Text\Combo\Check box) as I need to simulate sorting by clicking headers of template columns. (so it should be like a header button having lower orange border on mouseover and showing me up/down traingle arrow as sorting takes place) 

Can you guide me \ hint me towards the desired effect.

Thx very much,
Vinit Sankhe.
You can set the SortMemberPath property on the DataGridTemplateColumn which will give you the same sorting ability as the other columns.
